entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
